20110110150940.000|20110110150943.000|TR0|
20110110150943.000|20110110150946.000|TR0|Well, Saturday's shooting rampage in 
20110110150946.000|20110110150948.000|TR0|Arizona revealed the worst of human 
20110110150948.000|20110110150951.000|TR0|behavior and the best.  One hero who 
20110110150951.000|20110110150954.000|TR0|emerged from that rampage is actually an 
20110110150954.000|20110110150957.000|TR0|intern who was working for Congresswoman 
20110110150957.000|20110110150959.000|TR0|Giffords for all of a week.  Lucky for 
20110110150959.000|20110110151002.000|TR0|her, Daniel Hernandez had previously 
20110110151002.000|20110110151005.000|TR0|trained as a certified nursing assistant.  
20110110151005.000|20110110151007.000|TR0|He kept her calm, helped her breathe, and 
20110110151007.000|20110110151010.000|TR0|he used his bare hands to smoother the 
20110110151010.000|20110110151013.000|TR0|bullet wound right there on her head.  
20110110151013.000|20110110151016.000|TR0|Today, he's being credited with possibly 
20110110151016.000|20110110151018.000|TR0|saving her life.

20110110152416.000|20110110152419.000|TR0|
20110110152419.000|20110110152421.000|TR0|Veterans groups are up in arms.  But Gates 
20110110152421.000|20110110152424.000|TR0|says before you jump to conclusions and 
20110110152424.000|20110110152427.000|TR0|judge him, consider the all mighty dollar. 
20110110152427.000|20110110152430.000|TR0| He says, "Leaving aside the sacred 
20110110152430.000|20110110152432.000|TR0|obligation we have to America's wounded 
20110110152432.000|20110110152435.000|TR0|warriors, health care costs are eating the 
20110110152435.000|20110110152438.000|TR0|Defense Department alive.  The program is 
20110110152438.000|20110110152440.000|TR0|called tricare.  Here is where it stands 
20110110152440.000|20110110152443.000|TR0|right now.
20110110152443.000|20110110152446.000|TR0|
20110110152446.000|20110110152449.000|TR0|10 million people are eligible and the 
20110110152449.000|20110110152451.000|TR0|cost has exploded.  The price tag more 
20110110152451.000|20110110152454.000|TR0|than doubled to $50 billion in the past 
20110110152454.000|20110110152457.000|TR0|decade.  The plan is short on specifics,  
20110110152457.000|20110110152459.000|TR0|but we know this much.  Fees would go up 
20110110152459.000|20110110152502.000|TR0|for military retirees under 65, but rates 
20110110152502.000|20110110152505.000|TR0|for older retirees would stay the same.  
20110110152505.000|20110110152508.000|TR0|And health care for active duty  troops 
20110110152508.000|20110110152510.000|TR0|still free.
20110110152510.000|20110110152513.000|TR0|
20110110152513.000|20110110152516.000|TR0|And Gates says it could save up to $7 
20110110152516.000|20110110152518.000|TR0|billion over the next five years.  Paul 
20110110152518.000|20110110152521.000|TR0|Reickhoff is the founder and executive 
20110110152521.000|20110110152524.000|TR0|director for Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans 
20110110152524.000|20110110152527.000|TR0| of America.  Paul, the defense the chief
